title: SLUMDOG!

lines.text: Yeah, yeah, teraz by chcieli być jak ja
lines.translation: Yeah, yeah, now they want to be like me

lines.translation: Hey, hey, hey (yo)

lines.text: Dawaj mi klucze do miasta, bo jak wracam tam, to czuję się jak Slumdog
lines.translation: Give me the keys to the city, because when I go back there I feel like Slumdog Millionaire.
lines.grammar: Polish note: Verb focus: wracam (check person/tense and prefixes). Aspect pairs and rich case system; endings mark person/tense. Meaning: 'Give me the keys to the city, because when I go back there I feel like Slumdog Millionaire.'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Nie śmigam na pieszo, lecz z daleka słychać warkot
lines.translation: I'm not on foot, but I can hear the roar from afar
lines.grammar: Polish note: Verb focus: migam (check person/tense and prefixes). Aspect pairs and rich case system; endings mark person/tense. Meaning: 'I'm not on foot, but I can hear the roar from afar'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Za mną kordon na rowerach i ktoś jedzie rafką
lines.translation: Behind me there is a cordon of bikes and someone is riding a raft

lines.text: Zatrzymują mnie na światłach i chcą fotkę — mówię: "bardzo proszę"
lines.translation: They stop me at a traffic light and want a photo - I say, "Please."
lines.grammar: Polish note: Verb focus: prosz (check person/tense and prefixes). Aspect pairs and rich case system; endings mark person/tense. Meaning: 'They stop me at a traffic light and want a photo - I say, "Please."'. Highlight any set phrase to memorize and how the verb agrees with the subject.

lines.text: Wjeżdżam w tę alejkę, co łączy się z moim blokiem
lines.translation: I enter this alley that connects with my block

lines.text: Idzie młody, a ja idę o stówę, że niesie koper (smoke)
lines.translation: Here comes the young one, and I bet he's carrying some smoke

lines.text: Tam, gdzie po tej bibie spałem, zbudowali hotel
lines.translation: Where I slept after that party, they built a hotel

lines.text: Sprawdzam zmiany na osiedlu jak jebany deweloper (oh)
lines.translation: I'm checking the changes in the estate like a fucking developer (oh)

lines.text: I nas wyganiali z dachu, bo mieli to za głupotę
lines.translation: And they threw us off the roof because they thought it was stupid.

lines.text: Teraz ich dzieci do szkoły mówią: "mamo, proszę do tej"

lines.text: Właśnie mijam dupę — ona mnie nie chciała, też jej nie chcę teraz
lines.translation: I'm just passing by the ass - she didn't want me, I don't want her now either
